item.title: Docker Backup And Restore
item.description: Backup Container Volume Restore Container Volume Backup Container Volume docker run --rm --volumes-from containerId --volume /backup/path/on/host:/backup busybox sh \ -c "cd /app/folder && tar -cvf /backup/volume-backup.tar ." Restore Container Volume docker run --rm --volumes-from containerId --volume /backup/path/on/host:/backup busybox sh \ -c "cd /path/to/volume/data && tar -xvf /backup/volume-backup.tar"
